attributes.action: abolish plans to replace the image of Britannia on the 50 pence coin.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Britannia has always appeared on the fifty pence coin for the last 300 years. It is deplorable that we should break this tradition, and so request that the Prime Minister keeps the great Roman symbol of this wonderful nation on the fifty pence coin.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
